select u.user_no, r.reserv_no, m.movie_title, i.movie_time, t.theater_name, s.reserv_col, s.reserv_row from tb_reserv_seat s inner join tb_reservation r on s.reserv_no = r.reserv_no inner join tb_inning i on r.inning_no = i.inning_no inner join tb_movie m on m.movie_no = i.movie_no inner join tb_theater t on i.theater_no = t.theater_no inner join tb_user u on r.user_no = u.user_no where r.user_no = #{userNo}
order by r.reserv_no desc
